attributes.action: require his Ministers to listen and respond to dissenting views rather than simply offer to 'explain' policy to those of us too stupid to simply agree with them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent issues including health policy and road pricing have resulted in widespread public disagreement with Government policy.  The response of ministers to this has been based on the presumption that everyone else is wrong and if they could explain the policy we would all be converted.  The Governement would do better to listen to the arguments and be prepared to change policy.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
